kpis.label: EVI
kpis.description: Earned Visibility Index - composite score across all channels

kpis.label: Share of Model
kpis.description: Percentage of AI model responses mentioning your brand

kpis.label: Citation Velocity
kpis.description: New AI citations detected per day (7-day average)

kpis.label: Share of Voice
kpis.description: Traditional media mention share vs competitors

kpis.label: Content Velocity
kpis.description: New content pieces published per week

narratives.title: This week's visibility story
narratives.body: Your EVI increased 4.1 points this week, driven primarily by strong AI citation growth (+17%). The TechCrunch mention on Jan 5th contributed significantly to Perplexity and ChatGPT citations. However, traditional Share of Voice dipped slightly as competitors increased their PR activity.

narratives.title: Primary bottleneck
narratives.body: Content production velocity is limiting your ability to capture emerging topics. Competitors published 3.2x more content on 'AI marketing' this week. SAGE recommends increasing content cadence to 6-8 pieces/week to maintain competitive positioning.

narratives.title: Emerging opportunity
narratives.body: AI models are increasingly citing content about 'marketing measurement' and 'PR effectiveness'. Your EVI framework is well-positioned but underrepresented in AI training data. Publishing 2-3 authoritative pieces could capture this emerging citation pattern.

narratives.title: Risk signal
narratives.body: Sentiment score has declined 5 points over 7 days. Social listening indicates concerns about 'data privacy' following a competitor's incident. While not directly related to your brand, proactive messaging may be warranted to maintain trust.

recommendations.title: Capitalize on TechCrunch momentum
recommendations.description: Sarah Chen expressed interest in a follow-up piece. Schedule briefing within 48 hours to maintain relationship warmth.

recommendations.title: Publish EVI deep-dive content
recommendations.description: Authoritative content on EVI methodology is being cited by AI models. Expand with technical implementation guides to capture more citations.

recommendations.title: Optimize 'marketing ops' cluster
recommendations.description: 14 keywords have optimization opportunities. Estimated +2,400 monthly visits with minimal effort.

upgrade_hooks.message: Unlock detailed competitor analysis including their AI citation patterns and content strategy. See exactly how HubSpot and Clearbit are winning in AI search.
upgrade_hooks.sample_value: HubSpot's AI citation rate increased 34% after...

upgrade_hooks.message: Get 14-day forecasts for your EVI and Share of Model metrics. Predictive models show high confidence opportunity windows.
Automatically generated weekly executive summary with board-ready insights and ROI attribution.
